articles.author: Jemima Kelly
articles.title: We need a cure for the curse of digital overabundance - Financial Times
articles.description: Having all the products of human civilisation at your fingertips can feel overwhelming
articles.content: Last weekend, after a period of plenty of stimulation and travel but not nearly enough sleep or stillness, I decided to embark on a self-imposed 48-hour digital detox. I sat down and listened to reco… [+4527 chars]

articles.title: Capcom Simply Must Improve Dragon's Dogma 2 PS5 Performance, Concludes Digital Foundry - Push Square
articles.content: Dragon's Dogma 2 is an amazing open world RPG we've said as much numerous times in our Dragon's Dogma 2 PS5 review. But there's also no getting around just how unoptimized the title is on a technical… [+2188 chars]
